title: New drug combination shows promise for common pediatric brain tumor

title_detail.value: New drug combination shows promise for common pediatric brain tumor

summary: A new combination treatment aimed at resistant and recurrent low-grade gliomas slowed tumor growth and killed tumor cells in laboratory and mouse models.

summary_detail.value: A new combination treatment aimed at resistant and recurrent low-grade gliomas slowed tumor growth and killed tumor cells in laboratory and mouse models.
